info.name: Golfing Rolling feedback-177 c
info.description:
Golfing this great feedback shader by hamoid.
[url]https://shadertoy.com/view/3lKXRG[/url]
Please help me make this shorter.

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 U) {m}
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 U) {m}
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define m                                                                 \
  vec2 u = U / iResolution.xy;                                            \
  o = mix( o =  texture(iChannel1, u  ),                                  \
           pow( texture(iChannel0, u + cos(u.x*u.y*20. + vec2(55,0))/1e3),\
                 1.+.01*vec4(1,2,3,0) ),                                  \
          .95 + .05*fract(o.r/.12) );
renderpass.name: Common
